content: Amazing to see the FHIR community activity in last 2 days, and all the hard work of track leads and organizers over the last month. Thank you once again. Here wishing for stronger and sustained action / involvement going forward. :namaste:

Very well done, everyone!. I also appreciate all of the thought and hard work that went into this - it paid off. I'm glad that I had the opportunity to make at least a small contribution, and I, too, hope for great success for you going forward!
Someone - I don't remember who - was asking about travel history in FHIR
